review: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim is one of the best games I have ever played. Skyrim is a snowy and unforgiving place that has been struck by war. The Imperials and the Stormcloaks fight for the land and the freedom of Skyrim. Then there is You; A Prisoner (Like in all of the Elder Scrolls games) Captured by the Imperials and sentenced to death, and out of all of a sudden a dragon appears and attacks the local town you are in. The rest of the game is all up to you and your decisions.
